Afridza Munandar Meninggal saat Balapan, Ini Motor Kesayangannya
02 Nov 2019, 23:07 by Tempo.co, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Afridza Munandar, salah satu pembalap Indonesia bertalenta meninggal dunia setelah mengalami cedera dalam balap motor Asia Talent Cu di Sirkuit Internasional Sepang, Malaysia, Sabtu, 2 November 2019. Di lap pembuka, pada tikungan 10, Afridza terlibat kecelakaan dengan pembalap Jepang Shinji Ogu.
Balapan langsung dihentikan setelah kecelakaan tersebut dengan kedua pembalap mendapatkan perawatan medis. Afridza kemudian diterbangkan ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur, sementara Ogu dilaporkan sadar dan dibawa dengan ambulans. Terlepas dari upaya terbaik dari tim medis di rumah sakit, Afridza yang berusia 20 tahun meninggal karena luka-lukanya.
Afridza merupakan pembalap jebolan dari balap underbone. Ia sempat berada di salah satu tim Yamaha yang kemudian berpindah ke tim Honda. Pada Asia Talent Cup musim 2019, ia mencetak dua kemenangan dan empat podium lainnya, dan hanya 27 poin dari pemimpin klasemen Takuma Matsuyama menjelang dua balapan terakhir akhir pekan ini.
Meski Afridza menyandang pembalap Honda, ternyata tunggangan kesayangannya adalah Vespa PTS Special 90. Motor keluaran tahun 1970-an ini memang populasinya kalah banyak dengan model lainnya. Di pasaran, motor ini memiliki harga variatif tergantung kondisi salah satu situs jual beli ada yang menawarkan Rp 7,6 juta.
Beberapa kali, Afridza mengunggah keceriannya bersama Vespa tersebut dan rekan-rekannya. Tak hanya digunakan harian, Afridza juga mengunggah video dirinya bersama rekannya di klub Smallframe Tasikmalaya saat touring ke Ciwidey. "Tour de Ciwidey," ungkapnya dalam akun instagram @afridzasyah.

text:
Afridza Munandar died during the race, this is his favorite motorbike
02 Nov 2019, 23:07 by Tempo.co, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Afridza Munandar, one of the talented Indonesian racers who died after suffering an injury in the Asian Talent Cu motor racing at the Sepang International Circuit, Malaysia, Saturday, November 2, 2019. On the opening lap, at bend 10, Afridza was involved in an accident with Japanese racer Shinji Ogu.
Racing was immediately stopped after the accident with both drivers getting medical treatment. Afridza was then flown to Kuala Lumpur Hospital, while Ogu was reportedly conscious and taken by ambulance. Despite the best efforts of the medical team at the hospital, 20-year-old Afridza died of his injuries.
Afridza is a dropout racer from underbone racing. He was in one of the Yamaha teams who then moved to the Honda team. In the 2019 Asia Talent Cup, he scored two wins and four other podiums, and is only 27 points ahead of league leader Takuma Matsuyama ahead of the final two races this weekend.
Although Afridza bears a Honda racer, it turns out that his favorite ride is the PTS 90 Special Vespa. The motorbike output in the 1970s was indeed inferior to the other models. In the market, this motorbike has varied prices depending on the condition of one of the buying and selling sites that offer Rp. 7.6 million.
Several times, Afridza uploaded his joy with the Vespa and his colleagues. Not only used daily, Afridza also uploaded a video of himself and his colleagues at the Smallframe club Tasikmalaya while touring to Ciwidey. "Tour de Ciwidey," he said in his Instagram account @afridzasyah.
